HotelElement.Name: St George's Wharf Serviced Apartments - House Of MoLI

Description.Text:
Our serviced apartments in St George's Wharf stand out in every imaginable way. The design of the complex honours London's maritime heritage by following the streamlined shape of sails, while the interiors will leave you nothing to want for with our line of luxury products appointed to make your stay more relaxing and enjoyable.
Each one of our serviced apartments is set to provide both long-term and short-term residents with an elegant home. With open and innovative floor plans and key amenities such as fully equipped kitchens, wireless Internet access, freeview television and 24-hour security features, you will be guaranteed to enjoy the best in contemporary living.
With direct, pedestrian access to Pimlico, Westminster, Victoria, Mayfair, Chelsea and the South Bank, you will be ideally situated to become a fully-fledge Londoner in no time. Holidaymakers and business travellers alike will enjoy our first-class amenities, including many everyday necessities in your building, such as a supermarket, a pharmacy, a dry cleaner's, a dentist's office and several restaurants. St George himself could not want for anything more.
MoLi Apartments request guests to book prior to 1200 noon GMT (if the reservation is for the same day). * Credit cards incur a service charge for making payment (3.5 % on Master/ Visa and 4.5% on Amex) * We would require a copy of credit card authorization form of the guest / booker along with a scan copy of ID proof (valid passport/ driver's license) of the guest as well as third party if any. * We reserve the right to pre-authorize guest credit card with a 150 security deposit against any damages incurred during your stay.

Our serviced apartments offer the ideal base for contemporary travellers, being located in Vauxhall. Recent property developments have turned this laidback riverside quarter into prime-location real estate, as it's becoming one of the most diverse areas in the heart of London. Within a ten minute walk, you'll get to the Tate Britain and a little further downriver you will hit the Houses of Parliament. With Victoria station also located only a mile away you can always plan trips to the British countryside on a whim, or simply enjoy the view from your apartment on a balmy night.

Studio Apartment - Studio Apartment for 2 pax offers 1 double bed with all the basic amenities.
1 Bedroom Apartment - 1 Bedroom Apartment for 2 pax offers 1 double bed with all the basic amenities.
2 Bedroom Apartment - 2 Bedroom Apartment for 4 pax offers 2 double beds with all the basic amenities.
Most of our 2 bedroom apartments have 2 baths but some of them have 1 bath. Kindly put your additional request in case you require 2 bed 2bath.
